content.rendered:
Directed By Shiv Chanana . Alex Anthony Fernandes . Ekta Kapoor . Shobha Kapoor . Bhushan Kumar . Krishan Kumar . Aishwarya Meshraam. Amul Vikas Mohan

Written By Mohit Suri . Aseem Arrora. Aseem Arrora. Mohit Suri. Aseem Arrora

Stars John Abraham (Bhairav Purohit). Disha Patani (Rasika Mapuskar). Arjun Kapoor (Gautam Mehra). Tara Sutaria (Aarvi Malhotra). J.D. Chakravarthi (ACP Ganeshan (as J.D. Chakravarthy)). Shaad Randhawa (DSP Rathod). Digvijay Rohidas (Keshav Rana). Bharat Dabholkar (Divesh Mehra). Elena Roxana Maria Fernandes (Qiran). Riteish Deshmukh (Rakesh Mahadkar (special appearance)). Shivani Tuli (Rubina). Neha Shitole (Chetna – Ganeshan’s Assistant). Karishma Sharma (Siya). Kaizaad Kotwal (Siya’s Father). Aditya Lal (Aditya – Siya’s Groom). Aekam Binjwe (Yash – Keshav’s Son). Prasad Jawade (Ashu Bhoir). Riya Deepsi (Pooja – Ashu’s Girlfriend). Niranjan Namjoshi (Atul – Rasika’s Boss). Samir Suhag (Balkrishn Shastri). Badshah (Self in Shaamat song). Ivan Rodrigues (Thapar – Mehra’s PA). Milind Adhikari (Mhatre – Policeman). Ashish Warang (Shinde – Policeman). Ajay Jadhav (Tambe – Policeman). Satish Naikodi (Satish – Policeman (as Satish Naykodi)). Ajoy Chakraborty (Doctor). Sailee R. Gaikwad (Asha – Rasika’s Colleague). Hitesh Arora (Witness Boy). Rishikesh Ingley (Witness Boy (as Rishikesh Ingle)). Aayush Pal Choudhury (Witness Boy). Prabhneet Singh (Witness Boy). Kavita Banerjee (Couple Girl #1). Sanjay Parmar (Reporter #1). Vaishnavi Shenvi (Couple Girl #2). Rutuja Sawant (Reporter #2). Shaina Batta (Reporter #3). Roshni Thakkar (Band Member #1). Sanish Nair (Band Member #2). Siddhi Shah (Band Member – Drummer)

Language Hindi

Producers Shiv Chanana . Alex Anthony Fernandes . Ekta Kapoor . Shobha Kapoor . Bhushan Kumar . Krishan Kumar . Aishwarya Meshraam. Amul Vikas Mohan. Anup Poddar. Pooja Raheja. Ruchikaa Kapoor Sheikh

Production Balaji Motion Pictures. T-Series Films
